MembersItem.Name: IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED
MembersItem.Comment: Implicit layout an image is when its contents are undefined due to various reasons (e.g. right after creation)

MembersItem.Name: IMAGE_LAYOUT_GENERAL
MembersItem.Comment: General layout when image can be used for any kind of access

MembersItem.Name: IMAGE_LAYOUT_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_OPTIMAL
MembersItem.Comment: Optimal layout when image is only used for color attachment read/write

MembersItem.Name: IMAGE_LAYOUT_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_OPTIMAL
MembersItem.Comment: Optimal layout when image is only used for depth/stencil attachment read/write

MembersItem.Name: IMAGE_LAYOUT_DEPTH_STENCIL_READ_ONLY_OPTIMAL
MembersItem.Comment: Optimal layout when image is used for read only depth/stencil attachment and shader access

MembersItem.Name: IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHADER_READ_ONLY_OPTIMAL
MembersItem.Comment: Optimal layout when image is used for read only shader access

MembersItem.Name: IMAGE_LAYOUT_TRANSFER_SRC_OPTIMAL
MembersItem.Comment: Optimal layout when image is used only as source of transfer operations

MembersItem.Name: IMAGE_LAYOUT_TRANSFER_DST_OPTIMAL
MembersItem.Comment: Optimal layout when image is used only as destination of transfer operations

MembersItem.Name: IMAGE_LAYOUT_PREINITIALIZED
MembersItem.Comment: Initial layout used when the data is populated by the CPU
